page.title: 13HOME IMPROVEMENTS
page.content: Quite a few of the people who have bought the council houses that they live in have carried out{home {improvements}or extensions to there homes.So have some of the people who live in privatly built houses. These improvements are things like refitting a kitchen, bigger jobs include building a garage or extending an existing room,or adding on another room downstairs. Before one of these big jobs can be done a plan has to be made and submitted to the council.Only when the council have given{planning {permission}can work start. A lot of people do the work themselves,although some people do get firms to carry out the work for them.At certain stages during the building the work has to be{inspected to make sure that it is being done properly.
